name: Turtle, Rabbit, Hedgehog
description:
Select the turtle (1-key), rabbit (2-key), or hedgehog (3-key), and move them (arrow keys) to reach the exit. 

The rabbit can jump (up-key), the hedgehog can kill enemies (spider) by touch, and the rabbit can stand on the turtle. Be aware that the last two also block each others movement.

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P
